wikipedia_page.main: John Sampson (born 18 April 1955, Dunfermline, Fife, Scotland) is a Scottish multi-instrumental musician, actor and entertainer.

response: *John Sampson (13th century), Constable of Stirling Castle
*John Sampson (character), fictional character in James Patterson's Alex Cross novel series
*John Sampson (North Carolina politician) (1719–1784), American Revolutionary military officer, government official, and politician

John Sampson (musician), multi-instrumental musician, actor and entertainer. Sampson is notable for his collaboration with Britain's poet laureate Carol Ann Duffy in live performances since 2003. He was short listed for the Critic's Award for Theatre in Scotland in the Best Music and Sound category for his work on A Taste of Honey, Royal Lyceum Theatre Company, Edinburgh. He has appeared in eight Wildcat productions.
